column4: and took his reserved place at the baccarat table. Stephen stopped sipping his tomato juice and Jean-Pierre moved over and waited patiently by the table for one of the men seated on the left or right of Harvey to leave.|Not a Penny More

column1: 23:16|But I couldn't get out of the house straightaway because he would see me
column2:
so I would have to wait until he was asleep.
The time was 11.16 p.m.
I tried doubling 2s again
column3: but I couldn't get past 2(15) which was 32
column4: 768. So I groaned to make the time pass quicker and not think.|The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time|Mark Haddon
